turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Interama.
turn.2: Beginning 2010, Interama recorded and mixed all the songs for the 4th album, mainly written in collaboration between all four members.
turn.3: Did the band take a break or did they?
turn.4: By mid-2010 and with the fourth album finished but not released, Interama entered in hiatus.
turn.5: What happened with the band members?
turn.6: Sebastian Salvador started a solo career and Sebastian Pinardi, Luciano Mazer and Franco Italiano joined Suami with other musicians, being this a radically different project from Interama.
turn.8: On January 13, 2011, and being already in hiatus, Interama released the fourth album: "Fin del circulo imperfecto" (End Of An Imperfect Circle), co-produced with Leo Ghernetti.
turn.9: Did the band ever come back after the hiatus?
turn.10: This work had more freedom than the previous ones, being the song "Simple, como el viento que todo lo arrastra hacia el sol que todo lo consume", with more than 13 minutes long, an example of cohesion and absence of structures.
turn.12: The record is only available online on Bandcamp and Taringa.
